subject: Wordfence activity for March 10, 2025 on southernstarresearch.com

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:

firewall rule and malware signature updates, country blocking, and
detecting if your site IP is sending spam. Click here to upgrade to
Wordfence Premium now <http://www.wordfence.com/zz6/>.
